# BattleBots: Bounty Hunters

| starring           =
| narrated           =
| composer           =

| language           = English

| num_episodes       = 12

BattleBots: Bounty Hunters is a spinoff of the Discovery Channel's BattleBots.  This show's first four episodes premiered on Discovery+ on January 4, 2021, and the Discovery Channel on March 18, 2021.
Format
One iconic, destructive bot from the TV show BattleBots is chosen to be the bounty.  Eight bots compete in a bracket to become the "bounty hunter" which will compete with the bounty bot.  If the bounty hunter bot wins, the bot's team wins a portion of a $25,000 purse.  The same rules and judging system apply as in BattleBots season 10.

Episodes
|ShortSummary= The Bounty Hunters Tournament begins with the first eight BattleBots looking to make a name for themselves against an icon hall-of-famer bot. The very first "bounty" is wanted: Bronco, the legendary flipper bot. Which team will collect the $25,000 bounty? Fan-favorites, newcomers, or legacy bots.
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary=The semi-finals leads up to the final match. The last bot still standing will be the "bounty hunter" that will have a chance to wrangle Bronco.
----
Bounty Match: Bronco vs. Rotator (UD)
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= The Bounty Hunters Tournament continues. The second bounty is wanted: Icewave, an elite horizontal spinner bot will go head-to-head with the next "bounty hunter" bot.
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= It is the semi-finals and then the final match leading up to heat-up the bounty bot Icewave.
----
Bounty Match: Icewave vs. Skorpios (UD)
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= Eight more teams have a chance to become the Bounty Hunter as they win the final match. However, it won't be easy because their bounty is the legendary Tombstone, the king of kinetic energy.
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= It is do or die time when the winning bounty hunter bot takes on the most feared destructive bot of all-time, 2016 BattleBots champion, Tombstone.
----
Bounty Match: Tombstone (KO) vs. Gruff
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary=Eight more bots have a chance to collect another bounty. This time the bounty is placed on British bot BETA with its massive hammer that pounds bots into the arena floor.
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= A bounty hunter bot is determined and it has to collect its bounty on the mighty hammer of BETA.
----
Bounty Match: BETA vs. Lock-Jaw (KO)
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= There's a cash bounty on the head of fan-favorite bot Witch Doctor. Eight more teams are ready to collect, but first they must battle each other.
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= It is time to claim the bounty placed on Witch Doctor, but the remaining "contract killer" bots better beware of the Doc's voodoo drum spinner.
----
Bounty Match: Witch Doctor (KO) vs. SubZero
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= The final bounty bot is called; the long-time BattleBots contestant, Son of Whyachi one of the many successful bots from the Ewert family.
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
|ShortSummary= It's time to claim the bounty on the legendary Son of Whyachi and the last-standing bounty hunter bot is coming to collect the reward.
----
Bounty Match: Son of Whyachi vs. Gigabyte (KO)
|LineColor= 53C8E9
}}
}}
